resolves #36336

#### PR description:

Follow up on #35489, based on suggestion at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36336#issuecomment-1017505414.
   * 48fbd694eae12e121963803e0ae5c391807193a6:  Change to `SiStripCluster` DF, use `auto` for return types;

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.
title: Fix `SiStripCluster::size` return type
